name: odious
description: Odious fundamentally revolutionizes the software development paradigm by seamlessly integrating deployment considerations into the development process, thus empowering developers of all skill levels to create and deploy applications with unprecedented ease, marking a profound shift in how software is crafted and deployed.

scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'Updated Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;

author: @catpea
